title: The Christmas Party. Part 2/2: Episode 296
description:
This is the second and final episode looking at the tragic death of Barry Wallace and the other crimes of of man responsible for his murder, William Beggs.

1, Please take a few moments to fill in this short survey about my podcast and be in with a chance of winning a £50 Amazon voucher. Thanks.  https://forms.gle/c5sr4vP8Uxw8uoTT6

2, Buy tickets for my live show in London

3, Please buy my book 'Gone Fishing' about the life and crimes of Angus Sinclair
